project1.title: Portfolio-01 ROBOCON Legged Robot Competition Topic: Quadruped Robot Full-Stack Development
project1.desc: As a top competition in the robotics field, ROBOCON has high requirements for mechanical reliability, electrical control stability, and visual accuracy. In the 2025 season, I was basically fully responsible for the full-stack research and development of the legged robot team 1, from mechanical modeling, motion control to autonomous navigation. Adopting plant protection drone-like carbon tube assembly mechanism + force control algorithm + 3D radar mapping and navigation technology, we achieved good results in the 2025 ROBOCON (Jiangyin) legged robot competitions: 30th in the national speed race, 31st in the obstacle race, and 34th in the cross-country race (with more than 180 participating teams in the national competition), winning three second prizes at the national level.

project2.title: Portfolio-02 Bionic Boston Lobster Civil Submersible Robot
project2.desc:
This project is a multi-degree-of-freedom lobster underwater robot with controllable buoyancy. In the software part, I was responsible for the development of the control system, designing a lower computer framework integrating stepper peristaltic pump, motor/servo drive, gyroscope data processing, and closed-loop control of 360-degree servo by reading IIC encoder. Meanwhile, I designed a vector propulsion model for special-shaped multi-rotors to improve the omni-directional movement function. In the hardware design part, I was responsible for driver selection, step-down circuit, and waterproof design, etc.
The work won the special prize in the underwater robot track of the 2024 Fujian Provincial College Students' Intelligent Marine Equipment Design and Production Competition, and further represented Fujian University of Technology in the 2024 World Maritime Equipment Conference, which was reported by Xinhua News Agency, Guangming Daily and other media.

project3.title: Portfolio-03 Intelligent Transplanting and Harvesting Integrated Robot
project3.desc: Based on the FreeRTOS real-time operating system, the control system for the intelligent integrated transplanting and harvesting agricultural robot was written. By controlling DJI3508 motors, the functional debugging of modules such as the gripper lifting mechanism, omni-wheel chassis, and omni-directional positioning system was completed, ensuring the positioning accuracy of the gripper movement within ±5mm; simultaneously participated in the design of the air circuit system and hardware wiring, supporting collaborative work with another autonomously operating robot to efficiently complete tasks.
